lenders.name: Global Kids: LICHS, NYC
lenders.occupation: Global Kids: 30 students at LIC High School, NYC
lenders.loan_because:
WE WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD!! 

Global Kids runs various after school programs  at Long Island City High School in Queens, New York.  

In general we want to inspire young people to develop their leadership capacities to become the best they can be.

Our program with freshmen students is focused on community service activities and has proven to be a positive and successful program. 

On average, 15-20 students consistently attend the program week-to-week. 

 In January Global Kids collaborated with Stephen Shames Foundation to invite two Ugandan child soldiers as special guest to LIC HS. Katongole Godfrey and Ojok Charles were guest speakers during or workshop, they met with the students and shared their life experiences with the group. Excited and filled with hope, the students have decided to support small business entrepreneurs in third world countries through Kiva.org, an organization focused on helping people around the world using microfinance loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Global Kids (GK) is an organisation working in NYC high schools. We are committed to transforming urban youth into successful students as well as global and community leaders. Using interactive and experiential methods to educate youth about critical international and foreign policy issues, GK provides students with opportunities for civic and global engagement.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that I am called to do so.  I have been given much, more than I deserve and it is my privilege to help others!

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe the real solution to poverty is not taking care of people, but helping them take care of themselves (which is exactly what I can do through Kiva)

lenders.name: Tegwyn
lenders.loan_because: I feel like even though I am 13 years old, if I can change even in one persons life, I can change the world. And that gives me hope.
lenders.occupational_info: Lending helps me make a difference.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I examine the body looking for cancer

lenders.name: Kristin Taliaferro
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a break now and again and I'm happy to help. Plus, I'm impressed with all of the shining faces I see here and the enterprising people trying really hard to make ends meet, feed their families or run a business.  Life isn't a monopoly game.  We weren't all born with the same opportunities.  So, it's important to level the field by helping out.
lenders.occupational_info: I am excited about the way the recipients of these loans must feel when they realize a total stranger helped them out.  It makes the world feel smaller and gives everyone (the giver and receiver) a sense of magic in the world.....

lenders.occupational_info: I was an electronics technician for 34 years working at an international airport. I am now retired since 2005.

lenders.name: JPII - Jaguars
lenders.loan_because: We can.
lenders.occupational_info: As a class we study business but also raise money for charity and make contributions to our different  school campaigns.

lenders.name: Michelle & Chris
lenders.loan_because: We've been given so much in our lives and have so many things to be thankful for.  We're trying to do our little part to make things better for someone else.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because:
There's this great story which I have made into my philosophy in life that if you give a person a fish you feed them for a day, but with a fishing rod, their whole life. The problem with charities for me has always been the question you ask yourself, are you giving a fish or the fishing rod. In my view encouraging economic enterprise is the one way guaranteed to lift the unfortunate people of this world out of poverty.  
If I can help people realise their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their families and communities, and not disempower them in the process then I have, at the very least, a moral obligation to do so - but this gives me joy - to share the bounty of living in a prosperous first world country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Director of a boutique coffee roasting business which imports raw coffee, roasts and blends it, and sells it in Australia.

lenders.name: Shahnaz
lenders.loan_because: It is such a small way to make a HUGE difference in someone's life!

lenders.name: Simplex Opera
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs make things happen
lenders.occupational_info: We make simple applications with good design.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: I've always disliked the idea of giving to a large charity where I can't see what happens to my money.  I haven't got the time or resources to personally travel and try and change the world, so Kiva allows me to directly contribute to another person without needing to leave the country.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell rigid packaging (bottles,caps, cans, drums, etc.)

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others open the door to more opportunities than they would otherwise be able to achieve.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the online travel business, managing the Airline and Car Rental products for Hotwire.com, a discount travel subsidiary of Expedia.com.

lenders.name: Renee-Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and folks need it.

lenders.name: Kim and Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping women develop businesses to support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history at the high school level.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: to whom much has been given much is expected
lenders.occupational_info: I work with business owners like yourself. I provide Life, dental and disability insurance for their employees. If an employee dies their families will receive money to help them. If an employee is sick and cannot work we will pay them money to they can still take care of their families. If they have a toothache we will help them pay to treat the toothache

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Helping others around the world made easy.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.occupational_info: Basically I'm just a student trying to understand the world and help it along.

lenders.name: Nam
lenders.loan_because: i'm more fortunate than these people and want to empower these less fortunate people to help themselves, their families.. the end goal is everyone to have the basics in life. Anything less is just unfair on them.
lenders.occupational_info: i run my own business and a bigger scale than most of these people but the principles are the same. I wish you guys the best of luck and success.

lenders.name: David & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is what will create permanent change.

lenders.name: Nolan
lenders.loan_because:
“9 As it is written, He [the benevolent person] scatters abroad; He gives to the poor; His deeds of justice and goodness and kindness and benevolence will go on and endure forever!
10 And [God] Who provides seed for the sower and bread for eating will also provide and multiply your [resources for] sowing and increase the fruits of your righteousness [which manifests itself in active goodness, kindness, and charity].
11 Thus you will be enriched in all things and in every way, so that you can be generous, and [your generosity as it is] administered by us will bring forth thanksgiving to God.” – 2 Corinthians 9:9-11   Amplified Bible (AMP)

lenders.name: Simone & Michael
lenders.loan_because: Giving is a nice thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Growing our family business which is a Painting & Decorating business

lenders.name: Harminder Dhillon
lenders.loan_because: Joy of Giving. And giving more. And giving often.

lenders.name: Norm & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It is not wealth one asks for, but just enough to preserve one's dignity, to work unhampered, to be generous, frank and independent - Maugham

lenders.name: John, Parker and Jake
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do and a great lesson for my very fortunate children
lenders.occupational_info: I manage capital

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: It's so simple to do and makes a difference in someone's life.  All the recipients seem like such hard-working people just trying to make a better life for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a wife, daughter, mom of 4, grandmother of 1 and independent bookstore manager in Texas.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 4th grader.  I play the drums and I enjoy soccer and school.

lenders.name: Karl & Safiah
lenders.loan_because: i feel honoured to be a part of such a noble organization.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe in changing the world and entrepreneurs lead the way.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I want to think globally and care especially about women across the world who are not as lucky as I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach writing and reading to high school students in the United States.

lenders.name: Jay and Christy
lenders.loan_because: You can't put a price on helping somebody.  And we can't put a price on all who paid the price.  We've all had help along the way somewhere.
lenders.occupational_info: It's a pleasure to be a part of what kiva is doing in our global community.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I won the lottery of being born in America.  Others were not so lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide engineering support for a major avionics upgrade for Boeing 757 and 767 aircraft.

lenders.name: Carlos & Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I was born in a third world  country in where many struggle to provide for their families. I have been lucky enough to have been raised in the United States, lucky to currently live in a country where there are  vast amount of opportunities to improve oneself. Not everyone is as lucky as I have been. I believe that giving from the heart is a gift that benefits both parties at once- For me, helping someone else is a remembrance of where I originated from and how I got here today.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a stay at home mother to my two children. A long side caring for the children and home, I attend college in pursuit  of a double major.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: I was doing a class project on Kiva, and after learning all about the company and its strategy, I signed up!
lenders.occupational_info: I am earning a Masters degree at Stanford University.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a happy, secure and successful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I returned to school after 30 years to earn a degree in International Business.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: My life is so blessed!

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I have read about microlending and feel my money would be put to good use. It also doesn't hurt that your organization has the same name as my dog.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids ages 10-13 teaching them about world history.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the options and freedom in my life and would like return my gratitude by helping others to grow and achieve the life they were meant to live. Helping entrepreneurs is a vehicle to the pay it forward to bring more joy and direction to the entire community!
lenders.occupational_info: I help students believe in themselves to achieve and dream big through support and proper education.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I go to primary school. My dad gave me this money to lend out

lenders.name: AAPremlall
lenders.loan_because: I care. I admire entrepreneurs, especially women who go after their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Saving the world one day at a time, starting in Queens.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and I am sharing my birthday money until I know how I want to spend this gifts.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born and raised as I was, where I was, thus having more than enough to satisfy basic needs. As an entrepreneur consultant, I realize how much difference a little bit can make in someone's life.

lenders.name: fishpole
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me of the fish pole saying and it's a message i want to pass to my kids

lenders.name: Hakan
lenders.loan_because: We travel very much around the world and meet so many wonderful people. It feels worthwhile if we can help directly with a loan and support the help-to-selfhelp concept and improve the standard of living for many developing countries.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupation: Serving EBBF - European Bahai Business Forum
lenders.loan_because: education, trust and believing  in the potential of human beings are three ways in which we can improve the world. Contributing to reducing poverty and with that reducing conflict is definitely a good practical way to lie our lives. After all: The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens.
lenders.occupational_info:
Serving as director general of ebbf (http://ebbf.org), co-founder of HUB Madrid (http://hubmadrid.com), visiting professor of social entrepreneurship at EOI and innovation at IE Business School, judge of BASED at Stanford 

Passionate about connecting individuals to their integrity, creativity and ethics. Inspiring them into action by linking them to other like-minded doers and to their ideas. Help achieve and showing the success that ethical behaviours create in business. Promoting the evolution towards a world which will be organised, act and behave as one country. Where the creativity of the diversity of its citizens will enhance the wellbeing and prosperity of humankind.

lenders.name: Indi and Poppy
lenders.occupational_info: We earn our living by being creative.

lenders.name: Vera
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro financing is a better way to help people succeed.  And because I truly admire the bravery of these entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: shelley
lenders.loan_because: i know that one small deed can mean a great deal. and that the best thing to receive is the joy you get from giving.
lenders.occupational_info: mother, mentor, guidance goddess, lover, friend.....................and all things in between

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to be given financial and emotional support by my family throughout my life. I would like to help support the dreams and aspirations of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor who prepares college students to teach very young children - babies and preschoolers.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in the world however and wherever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle all administrative duties for a major government corporation.

lenders.name: jyotindra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small businessmen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am financial consultant.

lenders.name: Rn, Penny & Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people.

lenders.name: steven jon fischer
lenders.loan_because: I was raised to be a caring and giving person.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist and I also help musicians any way I can.

lenders.name: Bruno Fernandes
lenders.loan_because: One of million other ways  to help who most need.
lenders.occupational_info: Develop software tailormade solutions to customers.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in promoting a global economy, and only through the entrepreneurial spirit can this be achieved.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and maintain in house web applications

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can. I am very blessed with a wonderful family and friends. Helping others helps me set a good example of community spirit for my young son.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I work in a legal aid office. Our programs help those at the poverty level, the elderly and disabled.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways.  I have so much in my life for which I am thankful.  Helping others is a way for me to demonstrate my gratitude.  Also, as we help others to succeed, we improve the condition of our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the business operations of a construction company.

lenders.name: DIANE M
lenders.loan_because: I THINK WE SHOULD ALL STRIVE FOR PEACE, HOPE AND FELLOWSHIP THROUGHOUT THE WORLD.
lenders.occupational_info: HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: love
lenders.occupational_info: i write programs to keep computers working properly

lenders.name: Pastor Janice
lenders.loan_because: It's the very least that I can do.

lenders.name: Vilas Dhar
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the enormous impact microloans can have - and look forward to a world where access to capital is no longer a privilege but a right.  Please join our support of MFI's around the world by joining our team at http://www.kiva.org/team/the_dhar_group, where we have made over 250 loans of at least $25.00 each
lenders.occupational_info: At Dhar Law, LLP, we are working to build a law firm based on community lawyering - the idea that pro bono action, local engagement, and bringing together businesses and nonprofits can make a fundamental changes.  Learn more at http://www.dharlawllp.com

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have extra resources, while others that work much harder than I do don't have enough
lenders.occupational_info: I provide program and administrative support to the Bureau of Education and Cultural Affairs

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to make a living and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to college.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower the poor of this world to escape poverty.  I want to see the oppression of the poor come to an end.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer so I can design buildings to be safe and functional for the people who are using them.

lenders.name: Beverley
lenders.loan_because:
It is important to help people. 
This type of program enables one to give a hand-up. 
I really like that concept.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am semi-retired. But I have been working as a part-time sales associate at a store called "Seven Shores Trading Co."  The owners are dedicated to using Fair Trade practices when importing goods from around the world. They deal directly with the artisan, or local co-op, whenever possible. 
I have been a volunteer for many years, as a Sunday School teacher, and more recently at Operation Christmas Child. I have encouraged our Sunday School children to give...locally and worldwide. Some of our donations have gone to OCC, Samaritan's Purse, Salvation Army, ROOF, Sleeping Children Around the World, and local charities involving children or teens. 
It is very rewarding to see how generous the children have been. I will be encouraging them to become involved with Kiva in 2008.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a social worker but am now retired.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I can not do great things.  I can do small things with great love.  

When we help another we make the world a better place.

Peace
lenders.occupational_info: I loan millions of dollars to large companies.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to develop an educational sector for children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a private educationist, teaching and caring for children.

lenders.name: Ruth & Shane
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives.  We have been blessed with so much -We want to pass on the blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use their computers so that they can help themselves

lenders.name: Double Dog Farm
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the free market to create positive change
lenders.occupational_info: I make little things big

lenders.name: Will and Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We are proud parents.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Pastor of Youth in an urban setting.  My job is to organize and motivate adults to reach out to troubled teens and to share with them who Jesus is.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people have the chance to realize their dreams for a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in health care.

lenders.name: Mike & Laurel
lenders.loan_because: Just doing a small part to change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Bettina
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the love of good friends and family and I believe in paying it forward.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women and families.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who take calls and e-mails from our customers.

lenders.name: Vivia
lenders.loan_because: As someone who was once in need, someone was generous to me.  I want to do the same!
lenders.occupational_info: I study and teach at a university.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I am making this loan in honor of my mother, Gale Kohlhagen, who recently won her battle with breast cancer (she's the pretty lady in green).  As a tribute to her strength, I am donating this money, and plan to continue donating it to women in need (with a little more added each time) as it is perpetually repaid.

lenders.name: Sardar
lenders.loan_because: I want to raised my business

lenders.name: Brianna
lenders.occupation: child fitness instructor, detox monitor, intel off

lenders.name: Kendra
lenders.loan_because: I can see no greater use for my money than helping someone else help themselves.

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: I see it as a way to not only help people who are in need, but with these loans we are helping people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people succeed...and its always better to give than to receive.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help out more people with a loan than I ever could with a donation of the same amount. Once the loan is repaid, I can reinvest in other people who are working hard to provide for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I do odd jobs for a city's Parks and Recreation program, which helps keep kids active, entertained, and out of trouble. I currently do my work at the city's Aquatic Center and Community Center.

lenders.name: Rani
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the best way to empower and encourage people to become self sufficient.  It amazes me how a small loan can make such an impact on someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: We import metal accessories from a mid-size city in India and sell the products to wedding planners and florists.  The products are made by individual artisans for the exporters.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying psychology and storytelling in order to counsel people.

lenders.name: QinoOne
lenders.loan_because: It feels right to help others who are in need. We also believe in extending the concept of Fair Trade by supporting the people of Bolivia, the country where our quinoa grain comes from.
lenders.occupational_info: We import and distribute French spirits, including Qino One Vodka, made with quinoa and rye.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupation: Office Support for Market Research Company
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and I have heard wonderful things about KIVA.  I look forward to receiving progress reports and hearing from other lenders.  Feel free to contact me.
lenders.occupational_info: Help companies test new products

lenders.name: Fr. Peter
lenders.loan_because: I know that most people in the Third World do NOT want to exist on hand outs. To modify the words of the Chinese proverb a little "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Loan a man money so he can buy a fishing rod and so fish for himself then you feed him for a lifetime".
lenders.occupational_info: To carry out my Christian ministry in whatever direction I am guided.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: Kristen Balascio
lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky to have great people come into my life when I've needed them most. I simply want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help break the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly emergency response helicopters.

lenders.name: Riches Family
lenders.occupational_info: Mining

lenders.name: natasha
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to improve their situation.

lenders.name: Ramin
lenders.loan_because: My dollar goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: always in state of learning

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because:
I first began lending as part of a social change assignment in Melody McMurry's sociology class. I believe in giving others a helping hand up - not a hand out. We can all offer HOPE by Helping Others Prosper Economically.

This year (2012-23) my 4th grade students are in charge of my KIVA account. They put much thought and care into choosing borrowers. It is now March, and they have made 16 loans thus far.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a lifelong learner, and share my new discoveries with my students. They also share their knowledge with me. Together we are learning more about this great planet we live on. :)

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint the insides of peoples home . They pick the colors and I put them on.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best opportunities to give back that I have come across in a long time.  To play a part in improving the circumstances of another human being is priceless, especially when it is a means to make them self sufficient.  I think it's fantastic!

lenders.name: Gospelchor Michelbach
lenders.loan_because: "Think about his love"

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: it takes money to make money.  I also like that my loan goes to a specific individual with a specific vision and goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I treat mental illness.  The photo shows my helpers who come to work with me.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to apply the proverb: "If you want to help a hungry man don't give him a fish, teach him to fish up"

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business and know how hard it is to make it successful, even when you live in a place with a lot of resources.  I hope in some small way to help others.  Perhaps I may learn something to help my little business in the process.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: What comes around goes around.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: This concept is such a great idea that I had to help.  As others have said, I am blessed with so much that to participate with a small loan (or loans) that will make an incredible difference to someone in another part of the world is the least I can do.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor and I believe microfinance is the best way to assist the poor in a sustainable way, to give them a "hand up instead of a hand out."

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: If my small tiny loan can make bigger dreams happen, then it is a good day!

lenders.name: Jlaine
lenders.loan_because: We believe in a Hand Up over a Hand Out

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: giving is something that is important to me, and through Kiva I can give and continue to give, without feeling like my money could have been wasted or misused.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am working on a financial literacy program called The Secure Student, which teaches teenage students how to make smart decisions with their money in order to be better prepared for the future. I am also going to school and hoping to start up a business of my own when I have the time.

lenders.name: Jacqui
lenders.occupational_info: I help run advertising on the TV, radio, newspaper, and internet so people will know about new products available from my clients

lenders.name: The Hallz
lenders.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to play some small role in empowering individuals in developing countries!
lenders.occupational_info: We dream up and illustrate ideas to motivate other to purchase things, we teach electrical engineering technology, and we are constantly learning new concepts everyday.

lenders.name: Global Kids in TSL
lenders.occupation: Global Kids: 8 Interns in Teen Second Life
lenders.loan_because: We know how much change can happen if everyday people, and especially teens, make it a priority to care about those who have less opportunity, and know that our loan makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a group of teens from around the world that gather in the online community & virtual world of Second Life.  We're all working to educate our peers about social and global issues that we care about.
